desc:
The curious bipedal lizard lets out a musical chirp. More chirps respond from within the nearby grass, becoming a sinister chorus._  
Open Game License
name: Compsognathus

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Grasslands Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The compsognathus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in tall grass.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The compsognathus has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the compsognathus' allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
